channel.title: Noclip!
channel.description: hey can anyone please tell me how i can get rid of noclip? :)

item.title: Noclip!
item.dc:creator: @sonjichan sonjichan
item.description:
@sonjichan wrote:

eh? oh snap your right, I’m sorry… >< i wasn’t paying attention to what I was writing. Sorry. 3 is staff on my server however. SO what I ment to do was limit noclip to only staff, however doesn’t seem to work. oh well.

Read full topic

item.title: Noclip!
item.dc:creator: @Jonathan_M Jonathan M
item.description:
@Jonathan_M wrote:

[quote=“sonjichan, post:1, topic:60863”][quote]}
else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“noclip”) && playerRights >= 3) {
{
sendMessage(“Cheater n00b”);
}[/quote]

try that in place of the noclip command section in client.java. if it doesn’t work, then you have a wacky server base. I use project16v6/cheezscape.[/quote]
Are you crazy??!?! That does nothing what so ever! You just made code that says if your right is MORE then 3 (admin) it says Cheater Noob! And nothing happens! WTF?

Read full topic

item.title: Noclip!
item.dc:creator: @Javacisnotrecognized _^_
item.description:
@Javacisnotrecognized wrote:

You can’t. I just told you that. For most people, you can add this in the commands part

if(command.equals("noclip")) disconnected = true;

but for the smarter people, they won’t send the noclip command to the server, so you can’t stop them unless every time they walk you check that they are walking somewhere valid. You won’t be able to do yet.

Read full topic

item.title: Noclip!
item.dc:creator: @Javacisnotrecognized _^_
item.description:
@Javacisnotrecognized wrote:

hey pal:

hey can anyone please tell me how i can get rid of noclip?

You can’t get rid of noclip.

At least not until I tell you.

And I’m too lazy to figure it out.

Once I figure it out I may or may not tell you.

Read full topic
